analyzed: gong ma bzhin du shes byed la

analyzed: rko zhing bru ba ma nus ba

analyzed: tshon rnams kyis ni bri ba byed

analyzed: khar ba dag ni shis ba ste

analyzed: khyi yi thod ba byed ba gsungs

original: dbyibs rnams so sor byas pa'am //
analyzed: dbyibs rnams so sor byed ba

analyzed: yang na bsams te byed ba

original: bdag gis sgrub pa po la bstan //
